multi_floater.name: im session
multi_floater.title: Instant message
multi_floater.string: You are the only user in this session.
You have muted this resident. Sending a message will automatically unmute them.
Error making request, please try again later.
You do not have sufficient permissions.
You do not have that ability.
You are not a session moderator.
A group moderator disabled your IM.
Unable to add users to IM session with [RECIPIENT].
Unable to send your message to the IM session with [RECIPIENT].
You have been removed from the group.
You no longer have the ability to be in the IM session.
